Changing Bed Sheets

Single bed Double bed
€3 €4

Start Using Our Services

You have to

  1. Sign a contract with us
  2. Buy two sets of sheets for each bed. Buy sheets at the Beloteks store at Dunes Street 43, Nessebar, Bulgaria. Or provide money and we’ll buy them at wholesale prices. The prices are shown for two sets of bed linen and towels. It also includes a special blanket for each bed.
